TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 类使用的请求和响应对象的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the request and response objects used by the class.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供了与客户端的超文本传输协议相关的信息 (HTTP) 请求被 对象处理。This class provides the information related to a client's Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) request being processed by an object. 此类还包含允许 对象接受 WebSocket 连接的方法。This class also has methods that allow an object to accept a WebSocket connection. 方法返回类的实例 。The method returns instances of the class. 若要获取表示客户端请求的对象，请使用 属性。To get the object that represents the client request, use the property. 若要获取表示将通过发送到客户端的响应的对象 ，请使用 属性。To get the object that represents the response that will be sent to the client by the , use the property. 若要获取有关发送请求的客户端的用户信息（如其登录名和身份验证是否已通过身份验证），可以查询属性返回的对象中的属性 。To get user information about the client sending the request, such as its login name and whether it has been authenticated, you can query the properties in the object returned by the property. 关闭 对象会将响应发送到客户端，并释放使用的所有资源 。Closing an object sends the response to the client and frees any resources used by the . 中止 对象会丢弃对客户端的响应（如果尚未发送），并释放使用的所有资源 。Aborting an object discards the response to the client if it has not already been sent, and frees any resources used by the . 关闭或中止某个 对象后，将无法引用其方法或属性。After closing or aborting an object, you cannot reference its methods or properties. 如果这样做，则会收到一个 异常。If you do so, you will receive an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示客户端请求的用户信息。The following code example displays the user information for a client request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#8)]

summary.span: 接受 WebSocket 连接以作为异步操作。

span.span: Accept a WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 接受 WebSocket 连接以作为异步操作。

span.span: Accept a WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在 接受 WebSocket 连接后，返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the WebSocket connection has been accepted. 接收缓冲区的大小为16385个字节。The size of the receive buffer is 16,385 bytes. WebSocket keep-alive 间隔设置为默认值 30000 (30 秒) 。The WebSocket keep-alive interval is set to the default value of 30,000 (30 seconds).

-or-
contains illegal characters.

exception.span: 发送响应以完成 WebSocket 握手时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when sending the response to complete the WebSocket handshake.

summary.span: 获取表示客户端对资源的请求的 。

span.span: Gets the that represents a client's request for a resource.

value.span: 表示客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关闭此 方法，它将向客户端发送响应，关闭 包含响应的，然后关闭 此属性返回的对象。If you close this , it will send the response to the client, close the that contains the response, and close the object returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. `listener`变量保存 对象。The `listener` variable holds an object. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象将被发送到客户端以响应客户端的请求。

span.span: Gets the object that will be sent to the client in response to the client's request.

value.span: 用于将响应发送回客户端的 对象。

span.span: An object used to send a response back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通过设置此属性返回的对象中的属性来配置响应 。Your application configures the response by setting properties in the object returned by this property. 配置响应后，通过关闭响应或关闭此对象将其发送到客户端 。After configuring the response, you send it to the client by closing the response, or by closing this object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取对客户端请求的响应并添加响应正文。The following code example demonstrates getting the response to a client's request and adding the response body. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#3)]

para.span: 注意：如果在应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

span.span: Note: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。

span.span: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing).

summary.span: 获取用于为客户端获取标识、身份验证信息和安全角色的对象，该客户端的请求由此 对象表示。

span.span: Gets an object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the client whose request is represented by this object.

value.span: 描述客户端的 对象，或者，如果提供此 的 不需要身份验证，则为 。

span.span: An object that describes the client, or if the that supplied this does not require authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示它需要使用属性进行身份验证， 或通过 使用属性指定委托 。An indicates that it requires authentication using the property or by specifying an delegate using the property. 若要确定客户端的登录名和身份验证信息，请检查 此属性返回的对象中的属性。To determine the client's login name and authentication information, check the property in the object returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问有关客户端的标识和身份验证信息，并将其返回到响应中的客户端。The following code example demonstrates accessing identity and authentication information about the client, and returning it to the client in the response. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#8)]
